title: James Van Der Beek poses with his wife and five children in pirate gear ahead of Disney night
text:
He shared a snap of himself and his band of pirates on an ABC set on Monday.

And James Van Der Beek captioned it: 'Is this how you’re supposed to look fearsome?' His explanation: '#DisneyNight tonight on #dwts 8/7c on ABC.'

The 42-year-old actor credited his pro-dance partner Emma Slater for taking the fun snap.

Pirate crew: James Van Der Beek shared this Instagram snap captioned : 'Is this how you’re supposed to look fearsome?' His explanation...'#DisneyNight tonight on #dwts 8/7c on ABC'

It showed James and his wife Kimberley, 37, both in pirate hats with four of their five children - Olivia, nine, Joshua, seven, Annabel, five, and Emilia, three - brandishing large sabers while Joshua also modeled a hook on his hand.

Only little Gwendolyn, 15 months, was free of pirate paraphernalia and she looked a little surprised as her dad carried her in his arms.

The Varsity Blues star is currently appearing on season 28 of Dancing With The Stars. And he was spotted arriving at the rehearsal studio on Monday.

Meanwhile, his pirate brood of kids is set to welcome a new member. James revealed on DWTS and Instagram last week that he and Kimberley are expecting their sixth child, posting another photo of the family en masse.

The whole brood: from left, James, Olivia, nine, Gwendoline, 15 months, Annabel, five, Joshua, seven, and Emilia, three. And there will soon be a sixth child to expand the family

The Dawson’s Creek alum captioned it: 'Thrilled beyond belief to announce that another little bundle of joy has picked us to be their family.

'We chose to have our first ultrasound on camera with our #DWTS crew capturing the result - something I NEVER thought we’d ever do.

'But @vanderkimberly and I have been through three of those first appointments to discover either no heartbeat, or no baby, and she wanted to share this moment.'

He's ready to rock: James carried a large bag and a cup of coffee when he arrived at the DWTS studio on Monday

So serious: The Dawson’s Creek alum was dressed in black from head to toe

He said they also wanted to dispel the shame that some women feel when they miscarry.

'We decided to put ourselves out there - not knowing what we’d find - in an effort to chip away at any senseless stigma around this experience and to encourage people who might be going through it to open themselves up to love & support from friends and family when they need it most.

'Happily, for us - this time- we walked out with tears of joy. #AndThenIDancedAQuickStep.'

James and Kimberly have been married since 2010, following his divorce from actress Heather McComb.

In the pink: James donned a rose-hued jacket and matching shoes when he and pro dancer Emma Slater put on a fabulous display on October 7
description: He posted the photo of himself and his wife with their five kids on Instagram on Monday captioned: 'Is this how you're supposed to look fearsome?' His explanation.'#DisneyNight tonight on #dwts'
